result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeremy S Stephens was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Failure to Support Child (120 Days+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(2).
  • Failure to Support Child (120 Days+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.22(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Def to contact the DOC in Ashland within 48 hours!
If def is placed on probation or extended supervision & owes financial obligations ordered by the Court at the time of discharge, a civil judgment may be entered against the def for all unpaid financial obligations.

miscConds.notes:
The Def, being found guilty of a felony or other crime specified in sub.(1) under WI statutes Sect. 941.29 under the WI Criminal Code of requirements and penalties.
   " A person subject to the requirements and penalties is prohibited from possessing, receiving,
     obtaining a firearm/body armor." 

NOTE:  Under WI State Statute 6.03(1)(b) a person found guilty of a felony that you are ineligible to vote in any election until your civil rights are restored!
Def is to undergo counseling for criminal thinking through a Cognitive-Thinking for Change therapy program.

Comply with and follow all orders entered for arrearages payments.
Maintain monthly contact with the CSUP Agency by contacting the caseworker no later than the 5th of each month by phone, text, email or other approved form of contact by the caseworker.
  The Def is to provide a DNA specimen at the Ashland County Jail.

timeConds.notes:
Def granted huber release priv.
Def granted credit for time served.

Plea Cts 1 & 2 (Plea N/C & finds G) all other cts DRI. records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

records.addlTxt: Additional Conditions of Release.   Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of Court within 48 hours of any change of cell phone number;  Defendant (and/or surety)  is hereby noticed of the requirement to participate in the  court automated notifying system which automatically sends text messages, as data, to the recipient of their upcoming court hearing.  Standard text message rates may apply.
Called jail and let them know that Judge wanted def here in person for hearing.

12:50 PM Defendant Jeremy S Stephens in court with attorney Joseph Stephen Hoffmann.  Defendant Jeremy S Stephens in custody.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Jeremy S Stephens appeared by phone means from ACJ. Def signed a waiver of Extradition from Ohio and a warrant on the case. State comments on bail/bond- asking for $1000 cash bail. Atty comments on bail/bond. Def was allowed to call in since the def was living in Ohio, def has an ongoing heart issue. Atty filed a document from Adams Child support that the def is making payments. Atty is asking for $500 cash. Def has the same address and lives with mother- not working- seeking disability. State comments- aware of hearing and could appear by phone. 
Ct orders-- $1000 cash bail, WARRANTS cancelled.
Pre-prelim at this time. Def wants to waive prelim and go to argnment. Ct finds know and vol waives right to prelim, Ct finds PC the def committed a fel in Ashland Co. and bound over for argnment. State filed Info. Atty rec'd copy of info, Atty wants to proceed with Argnment by phone and video- def understands counts, knows potential penalties, waives reading and stands mute. NG entered for the def. 
Judge wants def here in person  Status conference scheduled for June 26, 2019 at 08:00 am.
Adams County Child Support Transaction History

records.addlTxt: Waiver of Extradition
Body Only Warrant - Nationwide

11:00 a.m. Attorney Ryan Anthony Reid in court.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def does not appear.  Atty have had communication with def towards last month and month and a half but not able to get in contact with him.  PH not working and no response to mail.  No ph number provided to COC's office; Did not sign bond either. 12-12 def stated filled out and returned BB, did not receive it, another mailed out to him.  Was on phone 01-19-18 when hearing scheduled - FTA - Warrant ordered for his arrest - Body Only - nationwide forfeit BB.  Atty will be contacted if defendant has been arrested.
L/M with Defendant's Attorney asking if he has a copy of Defendant's signed signature bond.

Defendant Jeremy S Stephens in court with attorney Ryan Anthony Reid both by phone.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty comments- talked with DA office, close to agreement, state would like some info from client- asking for another STC. ADA comments- did not have a prelim or waiver of prelim, no objection to STC, but need an argnment. Atty could be available for prelim soon. Waive time limits for prelim, no threat or force to waive time limits for prelim. Def be here in person.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 6, 2018 at 11:00 am.

Defendant states that he has filled out and returned the bail bond form (11/20/17) however the Clerk of Courts has not recieved it. Another bail/bond mailed today with a note included that he needs to fill out and return before his next hearing. A second copy is included for him to retain for his records.

Defendant Jeremy S Stephens appeared by phone means with Attorney Ryan Anthony Reid. Prosecuting Atty Kelly J Mcknight appeared for State of Wisconsin. Atty Reid appt a couple of weeks ago, asks for another status. Def and Atty may appr by phone.  Status conference scheduled for January 19, 2018 at 08:30 am.
to Ct from Atty Reid

Rec copy of compl, has filled out and returned bond form, has contacted child support. Def wants atty has spoken with pub def, does not have appointed atty. Def may appr by phone  Status conference scheduled for December 11, 2017 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Jeremy S Stephens appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Def has not received copy of the complaint. Def found that warrant outstanding, went to get license and they informed him that he had warrant out of WI. Def is disabled is waiting for clearance to go back to work. Def did speak to pub def in Ashland Co doesnt know if atty had been appointed. Does qualify. Warrant canceled. ADA asks for condition that he make monthly contact with the Child Support agency. $3000 SB comply with court orders, contact ACCSA monthly basis, contact within 2 business days from today, given phone. Given right to atty, may appr by phone for that hearing. Clerk to mail copy of complaint as well.
